org.netbeans.spi.java.hints

Annotation Type Hint


  • @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=SOURCE)
public @interface Hint
    Description of a hint. When applied to a class, any enclosed method marked with a trigger will be considered to be part of this hint. When applied to a method, only this specific method will be considered to the part of the hint. Currently recognized triggers include TriggerPattern and TriggerTreeKind.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String category
      Category where the hint belongs.
      String description
      The hint's long description.
      String displayName
      The hint's display name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<? extends CustomizerProvider> customizerProvider
      A customizer that allows to customize hint's preferences.
      boolean enabled
      Should the hint be enabled by default?
      Hint.Kind hintKind
      Whether the hint should be considered an inspection, i.e.
      String id
      Manually specify the hint's id.
      String minSourceVersion
      Minimum source version required to process this hint.
      Hint.Options[] options
      Specify various options for the hint
      Severity severity
      Default severity of the hint.
      String[] suppressWarnings
      Suppress warnings keys that should automatically suppress the hint.

    • Element Detail

      • displayName

        public abstract String displayName
        The hint's display name.

      • description

        public abstract String description
        The hint's long description.

      • category

        public abstract String category
        Category where the hint belongs.

      • id

        public abstract String id
        Manually specify the hint's id. Use only when reorganizing code to keep compatibility with settings from previous version. Id will be generated automatically if not specified.
        Default:
        ""

      • enabled

        public abstract boolean enabled
        Should the hint be enabled by default?
        Default:
        true

      • severity

        public abstract Severity severity
        Default severity of the hint. Severity.HINT will typically be shown only on the line with the caret.
        Default:
        org.netbeans.spi.editor.hints.Severity.VERIFIER

      • suppressWarnings

        public abstract String[] suppressWarnings
        Suppress warnings keys that should automatically suppress the hint.
        Default:
        {}

      • customizerProvider

        public abstract Class<? extends CustomizerProvider> customizerProvider
        A customizer that allows to customize hint's preferences.
        Default:
        org.netbeans.spi.java.hints.CustomizerProvider.class

      • hintKind

        public abstract Hint.Kind hintKind
        Whether the hint should be considered an inspection, i.e. it detects a code smell, or otherwise leads to improving the code, or a Hint.Kind.ACTION, which is simply an offer to do automatically do something for the user.
        Default:
        org.netbeans.spi.java.hints.Hint.Kind.INSPECTION

      • options

        public abstract Hint.Options[] options
        Specify various options for the hint
        Default:
        {}

      • minSourceVersion

        public abstract String minSourceVersion
        Minimum source version required to process this hint. Annotated hint will be never invoked for files configured for earlier source level. The value should be single integer e.g. "3" for source level 1.3.
        Returns:
        required source level
        Default:
        ""
